features: High Quality Material: This shoulder bag is made of high quality nylon material, lightweight, water resistant and durable; The shoulder strap is nylon material, it has a metal clip, convenient for you to adjust the shoulder sling according to your body height

Multi Pocket Design: Our men's casual sports bag features with multi compartment,3 Zipper pocket, 1 front zipper pocket, 1 back zipper pocket, it can accommodate your iPad, wallets, books, phone, glasses, and other small tablets

Shockproof & Anti-theft: This crossbody bag is characteristics with Anti-theft pocket and Anti-vibration particles,A back hidden pocket can make your wallet safer, shockproof compartment will effectively protect your iPad

Multi-Use: Perfect as shoulder bag, work bag, crossbody bag, everyday bag, messenger bag, satchel bag, sling bag, casual sports bag; Suitable for your daily business work and outdoor activities,it is a best gift for your families, friends, neighbors, coworkers etc.
Dimension: 11.41*9.84*5.12 inch, large capacity and convenient to carry 7.9inch ipad , wallet, cell phone, card holder, sun glasses and other small items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, holds 4 16oz water bottles
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a trip to Europe and it worked out great. Bag size is pretty good. It has enough different sections/compartments in different sizes to hold different things. Half size, closest to body, I carried some charging cables, the next was thin full size compartment where I carried some documents and my wallet, next is thicker full size compartment where I carried bottles of water, selfie stick, and the next is another thin full size compartment where I carried some tickets and the last, outer most is half size compartment where I carried couple of battery banks and tic tac candy.I did hit rain one day and inside was fine.One thing that bothered me a bit was that there's this metal ring outside which one of the zipper metal kept hitting and was making this ting-ting-ting sound as I walked which I later fixed by wrapping the metal part with some scotch tape.Overall, I loved it and survived all the European pick-pocketters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: 10/10 Recomend! It has lots of space to carry things and many compartments for the price you can’t beat it. Adjustable strap as well and it feels sturdy. The design of the bag also looks high end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little bag but does not fit all tablets and their covers
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a great bag. But if your tablet and case is too big it won't fit. Apple ipads will not fit into this even without the case. The lining of the bag is too thick and not removable. But love all the pockets and that this could be adjusted to be a crossbody, fanny pack or regular bag with the adjustable straps and its got space for all the little things one needs to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MONEY WELL SPENT
reviews.reviewText: Good construction .. plenty of room .. well thought out compartments. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for,.
reviews.reviewText: This bag is perfect, great quality, lots of pockets , just the right size . I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Part of the stitching was just missing, exposing the inner linings and padding. I sew myself, and noticed that the stiching was very widely spaced, which means one tiny break could expose the whole thing to falling apart. Ended up buying a used but absolutely intact leather bag at a thift store for a fourth of the price. Just needed a little saddle soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bag feels very 1st class to the touch and looks like it too. I don't know how they could sell this so low priced compared to what I see in the stores. I think its the best bargain at Amazon for cross body bags of this size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Bigger than expectedLots of pocketsAdjustable crossbody strapComfortableCon:My husband thinks it’s uglyOne of the pockets are partially sewn shut
